pr_title: Fix a bug in the segment range request

timeline.message: Fix the bug that causes segment range request failure

timeline.bodyText:
The CHUNK_SIZE and chunkSize are confusing here. It seems that CHUNK_SIZE is used for initializing LARGE_BLOB_SIZE here.
Why we need to change CHUNK_SIZE into a value: rand + 8191? Better to explain little about it.
timeline.author: xuhao417347761
